name: Dream Keeper
description:
Dream Keeper is a survival game that combines top-down-shooters with deck building that plays in real-time. You have to build your own deck and embark to this dream world that is swarmed with "nightmares". Your job is to survive and to eliminate nightmares using the deck you built.

Features
Three Game Modes: Arena, Campaign, Endless.
Choose from 66 unique game cards to optimize your deck in order to defeat waves of nightmares.
Earn rewards in-game to buy and open card packs for the ultimate SURPRISE MECHANICS experience, and it's quite ethical because there are no in-game purchases.
